text: Divine Ikubor (born May 1, 2000), better known as Rema, is a Nigerian singer and rapper. ==Early life== Rema was born in Benin City, Nigeria in 2000. ==Career== He started making music at a young age. He began releasing music online when he was just 18 years old. His first song, "Iron Man", was released in 2020. Rema got global recognition in 2022 when a remix of his song Calm Down was on the Billboard Hot 100 chart and earned a billion streams on Spotify. * * * * ==References== Category:Rappers Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian singers Category:21st-century singers Category:Nigerian hip hop singers
title: Rema (musician)
